channel.title: FusionPK - Official Launch
channel.description:
Ok so we're back. Original DB etc. Here's what Mew's pitch: Note: I asked for the previous thread to be removed due to spam. The mods are well aware of the spam now, so i'd be careful if you're going to spam. The server isn't complete, and we will continue to develop, but we want to get players onboard now. We have a new website coming tomorrow, and the clan system should be fully complete before long. We don't have many players now so appreciate that it will be boring, but PLEASE bare with us and get training. P.S. Some of the pics are from the old server, I noticed that a few of them don't have the latest updates! :) Thanks. Ownagesbot.
Mew:
::stake - Takes you to the staking arena ::stake - Leaves the staking arena - Will be changed to something else eventually
Once you enter the arena P2P items/spells will be enabled, as you all should know that this server is F2P but will allow P2P items/spells to be used at the staking arena. God spells will also be enabled so I am looking forward to seeing low level guthix magers.
FAQ
1) Can you drink super potions at P2P area and then go to F2P?
-No. Whenever you leave the arena you will be teleported to edge and your stats will be reseted to 99 99 99. All your P2P items will be unwieldable.
2) What happens if you logout inside the arena?
-Same thing. You will be teleported to edge with resetted stats and all P2P items will be unwielded.
3) Why does that happen when you logout inside the staking arena?
-We have been very protective in our methods of doing this. We don't want players to find bugs/exploits allowing themselves to wield/use P2P items/spells outside of the staking arena.
3) Can you use P2P spells in wild?
-No. A error message will appear telling you that the spell may only be used inside of the staking arena.
I have uploaded some pictures to show some of the stuff I have just explained.
Attempt to cast a P2P spell in the wild.
[url=http://img4.imageshack.us/my.php?image=magicspell.png][img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/6610/magicspell.png[/img][/url] [url=http://g.imageshack.us/img4/magicspell.png/1/][img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/magicspell.png/1/w508.png[/img][/url]
Entering the stake arena.
[url=http://img23.imageshack.us/my.php?image=stakeb.png][img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/5471/stakeb.png[/img][/url] [url=http://g.imageshack.us/img23/stakeb.png/1/][img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/stakeb.png/1/w508.png[/img][/url]
Leaving the stake arena.
[url=http://img25.imageshack.us/my.php?image=stake2.png][img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/4088/stake2.png[/img][/url] [url=http://g.imageshack.us/img25/stake2.png/1/][img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/stake2.png/1/w508.png[/img][/url]
Clan system - The clan system is not yet fully complete. However, most of it is done and the rest should be complete very soon.
What is missing?
Users cannot make their own clans yet because we haven't completed the page for this. (View the last picture below) Once users are able to create their own clans we will be adding functions/commands such as:
Clan kick - Kick a player from your clan (Clan leader/moderator only) Clan invite - Invite other players to your clan (Clan leader/moderator only) Clan accept - Accept clan invites (Anyone can use this) Clan leave - Leave a clan (Anyone can use this) Clan moderate - Make a fellow clan member a moderator (Clan leader only)
Who can use all these commands?
The player that creates the clan is instantly able to use all of the commands. I have written who is able to use which command in the brackets. The clan leader can then make other players moderators so that they are also able to use all these commands.
I have provided some pictures below to show what is already working --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Clan chat
[url=http://img525.imageshack.us/i/hiclan.jpg/][img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/4191/hiclan.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://g.imageshack.us/img525/hiclan.jpg/1/][img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/hiclan.jpg/1/w511.png[/img][/url]
Attacking other clan members
[url=http://img219.imageshack.us/i/cantattackclanmembers.jpg/][img]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/7475/cantattackclanmembers.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://g.imageshack.us/img219/cantattackclanmembers.jpg/1/][img]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/cantattackclanmembers.jpg/1/w514.png[/img][/url]
Clan tags on global chat
[url=http://img300.imageshack.us/i/clantag.jpg/][img]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/695/clantag.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://g.imageshack.us/img300/clantag.jpg/1/][img]http://img300.imageshack.us/img300/clantag.jpg/1/w522.png[/img][/url]
Clan management
[url=http://img404.imageshack.us/i/clanmanagment.png/][img]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/3063/clanmanagment.png[/img][/url] [url=http://g.imageshack.us/img404/clanmanagment.png/1/][img]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/clanmanagment.png/1/w564.png[/img][/url]
::say - Chat globally ::online - Displays number of users online ::onlinelist - Displays usernames of players online ::tired - 100 Fatique
Feel free to ask any questions

item.title: FusionPK - Official Launch
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

I think you’ll find that towards the end, FusionPK’s active population was growing exponentially. I at the moment literally have no time what so ever for this type of project, which left Mew on his own, he was also busy, but tried his up most to keep the server running. But it’s not easy and it’s certainly not cheap. I feel bad for leaving him in the lurch like I did but what can you do? I’ve gotta get on irl. Lock this topic. It was great while it lasted. Mew pointed our domain to RSCA in a bid to send our players there, pretty much the only server that have a clue what they’re doing.

Read full topic

item.title: FusionPK - Official Launch
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote="!Mew, post:111, topic:289922"]Jessekins - Are you fucking depressed or what?

My protected IP was 72.20.14.141 not the IP that you showed above - What staminus done with my server/IP afterwards is not my concern. Use your brain and you might think of a good explanation, just maybe.[/quote]

That made NO sense, whatsoever. GOOD JOB. If I use my brain I might think of a reason why Fusions URL directed it to my friends server? HMM maybe because it was the same IP? You’re a fucking idiot.

!Mew:

Your server will fail anyway, all you do is whine and your not a very impressive programmer. I checked your site out earlier and you posted the most pathetic excuse ever to one of your forum users to why you couldn’t do something.

It isn’t MY server. Period.
You haven’t seen any of my work since I started coding again. Wrong again kid.
What pathetic excuse? That I didn’t want to make the DM command client-side? I don’t have to if I don’t want to, how is that pathetic? Again, you’ve proven yourself to be an idiot.

!Mew:

But if you can provide a fun server for the remaining players of this scene then goodluck with it. (I doubt it however)

You doubt… LOL. What was your little excuse? That you didn’t have “time”? Yeah, you didn’t have time alright… For your 2 - 3 members that still played.

!Mew:

@C1 - It’s more than me just being “busy” I just can’t be bothered to get into it all, especially on these forums. The only person that I could trust to continue it is Ownagesbot and he is also to busy.

Yeah, that’s the excuse you used. “Busy” and “can’t be bothered to make up a lie”.

You’re pathetic.

Read full topic

throw me its source ill put it to good use…

Like staminus are actually stupid enough to re-sell a server without cleaning everything.

Jessekins - Are you fucking depressed or what?

My protected IP was 72.20.14.141 not the IP that you showed above - What staminus done with my server/IP afterwards is not my concern. Use your brain and you might think of a good explanation, just maybe.

Your server will fail anyway, all you do is whine and your not a very impressive programmer. I checked your site out earlier and you posted the most pathetic excuse ever to one of your forum users to why you couldn’t do something.

But if you can provide a fun server for the remaining players of this scene then goodluck with it. (I doubt it however)

This should be locked/closed.

We all know how quick Jessekins is with the flame/response.

-Mew

item.title: FusionPK - Official Launch
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“vaiu, post:105, topic:289922”][quote author=Jessekinss link=topic=383252.msg2969535#msg2969535 date=1253849885]

the trolling began on march 28 2009 after you banned me from rscpk. you also have yourself to blame for it, for feeding the flames. i added you on facebook, yes, and i do know very well what kind of response i will received

and yes, social rejection is nothing new to me. you sure got me there jessekins!!!11

we’ll let the moparscapians decide whose “flame post” was better.

besides, you’re not one to talk about “text being effective on the internet”, as you’re very keen on arguing with others on the internet…

Shadowsoul: don’t worry, i’ll be muted soon enough.

You honestly remember the date? That’s VERY pathetic dude. VERY pathetic.
You’re acting as if I should care if you follow me around like a lost dog. I don’t care lmfao. You can cry all you want to, I honestly don’t care. Apart from still being stuck on getting banned from RSCPK (for something that YOU caused), it’s just very pathetic.

There. Now that we’re on the same page about you being socially excluded, we can move to the next subject.

You misread what I said buddy. You’re trying too hard to “troll”. I was acting like YOU, correct? Now, it says I (keeping in mind I was acting like I was you). So, by saying I (meaning you), I meant that YOU think text is effective over the internet.

I hope that wasn’t too confusing for you. Even if it wasn’t you still wouldn’t get it anyways.
[/quote]

a few problems here:

  1. apparently, being good at remembering dates makes me “pathetic”

  2. you say that you “don’t care” but you’re always quick to start an argument over something… pretend to not care all you want jessekins, i already know that you’re always emotionally debilitated.

  3. no i am not “stuck on being banned from rscpk”, i’m just reminding you of what started all of this.

  4. yes thanks for reminding me of my social rejection (on the internet, boo-hoo)

  5. yes i know what you meant about “text having meaning on the internet”, but since you’re bringing that up about me, i suppose i should do the same to you (oh wait, you’ll say something asinine, such as, “we’re not talking about me, we’re talking about YOU”) also, of course text has meaning… the internet is made up of it.

  6. if you know that “i wouldn’t get it anyways”, what was the purpose of hoping that it wouldn’t be too hard for me to comprehend? logic jessekins, plz try to obtain some.

  7. and last but not least, LOL at you jessekins[/quote]

Yes, it does make you pathetic. I asked a few people if they remember you, or you being banned. They said no. Getting banned from RSCPK obviously traumatized you. It’s one thing to still be upset over something that happened 6 months ago, but it’s another thing to obsess over it, and obsess over the guy who banned you. I honestly believe you should be in therapy if you care so much about being banned over a game, a game that’s not even around anymore.

Having being amused by arguments means I care? That honestly makes no sense. It’s hypocritical of you to say that anyways. You’re the one always starting with me correct? Now each and every time you say you don’t care. Yeah I think otherwise.
How you read my text has no bearing on how my real emotional feeling are. If you think that it does then you honestly care too much to think so.

If you have that good of a memory, then you should remember that it was also your fault for being banned. I believe you attacked an administrator while he was trying to talk to you. You being a repeated problem maker before on RSCPK, stirring up my members for no reason, it was a ticking time bomb for you to be banned. Sure, I could have toughed it out and let you stay. The question is - Why? You were no use to me or RSCPK. You complained every chance you got. No matter how much my server “sucked”, you always came back. One person can only take but so much, and you crossed that line.
I believe that, since I’m not the type of guy to cater to every one of your needs and wont listen to reason once I made up my mind, you can’t stand that. Since every other server that you have been on listened to what you had to say (I’m just guessing here, don’t take it too seriously), that you held a grudge against me. I’m also thinking, because of that reason it has done something to you. I’m not sure what, but it’s obviously made you completely obsessed over me. Flattering as it is, that I can have such an affect over someone, you need to get over it.

I like how you said “over the internet”. You and I both know I cannot prove that you have no friends off the internet (as obvious that it is, you don’t have friends, I still can’t prove it). It’s the oldest trick in the book. It’s old.

That honestly made no sense. “The text has meaning, the internet is made up of it”. That most certainly does not mean the text has meaning. It just means the internet uses text. It is YOU to de-cipher whether the text means something to you or not.

To see you struggle, like you do with all of your other arguments. Though you STILL didn’t get what I was saying, obviously, but I’ll let that go. Mainly because it was only for my enjoyment. I can see another little technique you do. You over exaggerate. “logic, please try to obtain some”.
We both know I knew what I was talking about, you just tried to make it out like you knew too. I forgot how fun it was to argue with you.

If there was something to laugh at, Pork, I would be laughing to. Sadly, it’s all you.

Oo damn, just realized how much I wrote.

Read full topic

hi i’m jessekins, and i’m an angry black guy who thinks that he’s so cool because his english is more fluent than most of his ape brethren. and please, if i’m hypocritical, that’s perfectly fine. if you’re hypocritical, i’ll be the first one to point it out, cause i’m cool like that yo! and if you say something i find offensive, i’ll say “you don’t know me so stfu”, while i’ll go ahead and make assumptions about others as well, then cry about “the truth hurts” when my flaws are pointed out.
